#  {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

## $\odot$ {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

The goal of RAMP has been to develop and implement **Adaptive Malaria Control,** working in collaboration with the **National Malaria Control Division** (NMCD) and **Division of of Health Information** (DHI) of **Uganda**'s National Ministry of Health. 

To serve NMCD's strategic planning, we are developing simulation models for malaria in Uganda using the national HMIS data. 

+ [District_Icons](website/District_Icons.html)

+ [Movies](website/Movies.html)

+ [Modeling](website/Modeling.html)
